definitions.body: testify, bear witness, c. sf. against one 1Ki 21:10, 1Ki 21:13; in favour of Job 29:11, La 2:13 (Qr); c. [[בֵּין]] Mal 2:14.
cause to testify, take as witness, c. acc. pers. Is 8:2, Je 32:10, Je 32:25, Je 32:44; call as witness, invoke, c. acc. [[את השׁמים ואת הארץ]] + [[בְּ]] against De 4:26, De 30:19, De 31:28.

protest, affirm solemnly, warn: subj. men, abs. Je 6:10, Ne 13:15; c. [[בְּ]] pers. Ge 43:3, Ge 43:3 (J) Ex 19:21 (E) 1Sa 8:9, 1Sa 8:9, 1Ki 2:42, 2Ch 24:19, Ne 9:26, Ne 13:21, Je 42:19, Am 3:13; exhort solemnly, admonish, charge, ´[[י]] subj., c. [[בְּ]] pers., Ex 19:23 (J) De 8:19, 2Ki 17:13, Ne 9:29, Ne 9:30, Je 11:7, Je 11:7, Je 11:7, Zec 3:6, Ps 50:7, Ps 81:9; enjoin solemnly, c. [[בְּ]] pers. + acc. rei [[עֵדְוֹת]] 2Ki 17:15, Ne 9:34, [[דברים]] De 32:46.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[וְהוּעַד]] consec. Ex 21:29 (E) impers. and protest be entered, c. [[בְּ]] pers.
